item.description:
Nice way to draw down your weekend with a round on Sunday afternoon. The tee time I have is for 2:44pm on Sunday 6/26.

Sound good? Join me at the Billerica Country Club in Billerica, MA. The course is very fun to play, and a little more challenging. I find it very walkable, but some I've played with here prefer a cart. The course has a nice driving range for warm-up beforehand.

www.countryclubofbillerica.com

Rates are:

9 Holes - $23.00, $33.50 with cart

18 Holes - $38.00, $54.50 with cart

For a full list of rates check the website directly:

http://www.countryclubofbillerica.com/great_golf/tee_times_and_rates.php

If you're interested, but would prefer a different time drop me a line, I'm always open to suggestions based on where the interest is!

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Billerica Country Club - Billerica, MA
